messages.messageBody:
>
> >
>Joz, I have a fun book that you ds might enjoy called Blood and Guts: A
>Working Guide to Your Own Insides by Linda Allison. "It will show you
>experiments to try and tools to make that will help you see and feel and hear

We've used the Anatomy Coloring Book a lot. There's also a physiology
coloring book, but I'm not sure if that would be the title.
Tia

No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Eleanor Roosevelt

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] learning about human anatomy was paper waste
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 08/21/2002 4:15:25 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Joz, I have a fun book that you ds might enjoy called Blood and Guts: A Working Guide to
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 08/21/2002 4:15:25 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
zandaniel@... writes:


> My ds 6 traced an outline of his body on the drop-sheet today and
> wanted to know what the inside of his body looked like. He wants to
> paint his heart etc in the outline. Back to the library - lol
>
Joz, I have a fun book that you ds might enjoy called Blood and Guts: A
Working Guide to Your Own Insides by Linda Allison. "It will show you
experiments to try and tools to make that will help you see and feel and hear
what is going on inside. You'll amaze yourself." In addition, all the color
atlases of the human body are fascinating.

Ginny
